(''no parameter'')
Angles the actor 5.6 degrees to the left and spawns {{Class|FastFlameMissile}} 48..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Classic attack}} '''A_CrusaderSweepLeft'''
(''no parameter'')
Angles the actor 5.6 degrees to the left and spawns {{Class|FastFlameMissile}} 48 units from the actor's feet. The projectile is set to have an initial upward velocity of 1. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Crusader}} and derived classes.
